description: The REFERRAL_BED_DAY table contains information on bed days on referrals.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral in database.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: A line number that is used to identify a group of bed day information

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the member is scheduled to start treatment associated with each bed day type

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the member is scheduled to or actually does complete treatment associated with each bed day type.

columns.name: BED_DAY_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The bed day type or classification used to categorize the scheduled days of treatment.

columns.name: BED_DAY_TYPE_ID_BED_DAY_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bed day type record (i.e. ICU or non-authorized.)

columns.name: ESTIMATED_DAYS
columns.description: The estimated number of days the member spends in treatment associated with each bed day type.

columns.name: CONVERTED_DAYS
columns.description: A manual conversion of the calculated number of Raw days for each bed day type, the raw days are calculated from the start and end date. Partial days are allowed

columns.name: RAW_DAYS
columns.description: Displays the actual number of days the member spends in treatment associated with each bed day type, calculated from the start and end date. Partial days are allowed.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_DAYS
columns.description: A manual override of the calculated number of days for each bed day type. Partial days are allowed.

columns.name: AVOID_BED_DAY_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track the avoidable bed day reason for the current row in the bed days table.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BED_DAYS_COMMENTS
columns.description: Track the comments for the current row in the bed days table. If the comment is more than 256 characters, it will be truncated to 256.

columns.name: DEN_BED_DAY_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track the denied reason for the current row in the bed days table.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BED_DAY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track the Approved/Denied status for the current row in the bed days table.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Denied

columns.name: APPR_BED_DAY_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track the approved reason for the current row in the bed days table.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REQUESTED_ON_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Track the date and time the bed day was requested for the current row in the table.

columns.name: DECIDED_ON_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Track the date and time a decision was made on the bed day status for the current row in the table.

columns.name: BED_DAY_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The bed days request priority category ID for the bed day line on the referral record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Routine


Urgent


Emergency


Elective


Two Week Wait


See Details
